explanation: The binary search upper bound r was set to maxday, which causes an off-by-one when the first day with total pills ≤ K is maxday+1. Changing r to maxday+1 expands the search interval to include that possible day. This is an off-by-one fix (similar in spirit to fixes that adjust bounds such as replacing < with <= or extending loop ranges in the retrieved diffs).
